Posts.Content: Miskoehn wrote: hello , the last 3weeks I have noticed my breast are hurting . After my last period the soreness never went away and my husband noticed they seem a bit fuller . Now I can't be pregnant so that's off the table . I did notice yesterday my right breast has a lump . And sometimes the soreness becomes a pain and it goes to my armpit . My family history isn't great my grandmother(mothers side )and her sister both had breast cancer . I'm staring to worry , over the last new months I've had 3ovarian Cyst that have ruptured ,for the first time in my life and now this . I just turned 40 . Thanks for listening Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Questions Miskoehn Simms8212
